description: This file is an HTML webpage that serves as the front-end interface for a database viewer application. It provides UI elements such as a sidebar for database selection, a main content area for displaying tables and data, and includes embedded CSS and JavaScript for rendering, user interaction, and asynchronous data fetching from backend API endpoints.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases when user clicks the refresh button.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the table list of a selected database and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for the data table, including headers and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates individual table cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses table cell content for detailed view.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Displays a loading message in a specified element.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Displays an error message in a specified element.

methods.name: showEmptyState
methods.description: Displays an empty state message in a specified element.

methods.name: setActiveState
methods.description: Sets the active class on a specified element, clearing previous active states.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Performs fetch API calls, parsing JSON responses and handling errors.
